title: Time Measurement Game Learning Based on Real-Life Contexts: Exploring Time Concepts Through Traditional Spinning Top Games

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of time units (hours, minutes, seconds) and experience with simple measurement activities
context.additional_context: Connecting time measurement concepts to real-life problems in a blended learning environment combining digital devices and traditional games

learning_goals: Students can measure time intervals in daily life using non-standard units (e.g., number of top spins)
Explain the conversion process between standard time units (hours/minutes/seconds) and non-standard units
Record and analyze time measurement experiment data by linking digital tools (stopwatch apps) with physical games
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
